question: X was a television show which aired from 1986 to 1990. It featured a comedian named Kitani. It was special because of the fact that more people have been able to step on the moon than to win this show, displaying the level of difficulty of the games. Identify the famous show.

X was an American sitcom starting from the late 90s. It is stated that the creator of the show named the hypothetical place after the institution he studied. It is also reflected in the show as the place names like Pawtucket and Buddy Cianci resemble a real life place. Identify the famous sitcom.

Like many shows from the 1930s and 1950s, X featured racial stereotypes. For example, after explosions, the characters with blasted faces resembled stereotypical blacks with large lips and bow tied hair. Perhaps one of the most controversial elements of the show was the character named Mammy Two Shoes who was a poor black maid who speaked stereotypical black accent. Identify the famous series X.

Delving into the annals of animated entertainment, there's an enduring series that has been a beacon of satirical brilliance for decades. It chronicles the misadventures of a quirky family in the fictional town of Springfield. Can you identify this cultural gem, known for its astute social commentary and wit, and coincidentally predicting the futuristic events of real life.

A regal heir who embraced ascetic robes journeyed beyond the Ganges and Himalayas. In Shaolin's embrace, he blended Indian wisdom with martial prowess. A movie was made on his journey that turned out to be a classic,can you unveil this Indian prince of spiritual legacy and martial arts fusion?
